Bash(python -c "
import re

# Read the file
with open(''public/news/october-2025-product-update.md'', ''r'', encoding=''utf-8'') as f:
    content = f.read()

# Remove indentation from all lines (but preserve blank lines)
lines = content.split(''\n'')
unindented_lines = []
for line in lines:
    # Strip leading whitespace from all lines
    unindented_lines.append(line.lstrip())

# Join back together
new_content = ''\n''.join(unindented_lines)

# Write back
with open(''public/news/october-2025-product-update.md'', ''w'', encoding=''utf-8'') as f:
    f.write(new_content)

print(''Removed all indentation from markdown file'')
")
